backend/main.mo: Defines data types and storage for videos, categories, settings, admin config, quizzes, results, and user profiles with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries describing implemented features, associated components, files, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short descriptions of many frontend files, summarizing their responsibilities and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer and CSS variable definitions for light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, auth/role guards, and theme provider for the React app.
frontend/src/components/admin/Categories: Admin component to list, add, and delete video categories with confirmation dialogs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/DashboardV: Form for editing admin dashboard visual settings, including gradients, colors, and overlay values, with data loading and mutation updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/DonationLi: Simple form to view and update the donation link stored in admin settings.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomeConten: Dialog-based editor for homepage text fields, loading existing settings and submitting updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageVi: Form for configuring homepage visuals including hero background, overlay settings, and optional image upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/LogoUpload: Component for uploading, previewing, removing, and saving a site logo using ExternalBlob uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuizEditor: Modal editor for creating or updating quizzes tied to videos, supporting dynamic questions, answers, and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/QuizzesMan: Lists quizzes, supports creating, editing, and deleting quizzes with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/ThemeSetti: Displays and updates theme color settings using form inputs and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserManage: Shows all users with anonymized identifiers and allows updating their status.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideoEdito: Modal form for adding or editing videos, handling fields, thumbnail uploads, and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/VideosMana: Displays video list with thumbnails and provides create, edit, and delete actions via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Simple screen informing the user of denied access and offering a link back home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to create a profile, saving it via a mutation in a modal form.
frontend/src/components/donations/PostQu: Modal shown after quiz completion that displays score and links to a donation page.
frontend/src/components/donations/ShowSo: Standalone donation button that opens the admin-configured donation link.
frontend/src/components/home/HomeContent: Renders home page hero text from admin settings and allows admins to edit it.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer displaying copyright info and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with logo, navigation, login, donation button, and mobile menu using admin settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper providing header, footer, theme initialization, and page content area.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Fetches and displays top 5 quiz results with anonymized usernames.
frontend/src/components/quizzes/QuizTaki: Handles quiz answering, submission, scoring, and shows results plus donation modal.
frontend/src/components/quizzes/VideoQui: Loads quizzes for a video and lets users select and take one.
frontend/src/components/videos/VideoCard: Displays a video with YouTube embed handling and quiz section for authenticated users.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on user identity and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Determines current user authentication, role, profile, and admin status using actor and queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as settings, videos, categories, and quizzes using an actor interface.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Applies theme colors from settings data to CSS variables and exposes the current theme.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light and dark mode CSS variables for colors, layout, and UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays the user's quiz results with timestamps and scores, using a card layout and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Provides an admin dashboard with tabbed management interfaces for videos, categories, quizzes, users, appearance, and home content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with configurable hero visuals, leaderboard, and categorized video sections based on admin settings.
frontend/src/utils/privacy.ts: Generates an anonymized user label by extracting and truncating the last segment of an identifier.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, architecture notes, and known issues for the Pocketflix ICP app.
